# objc_getClass(_:)

**Function**

Returns the class definition of a specified class.

## Declaration

```swift
func objc_getClass(_ name: UnsafePointer<CChar>) -> Any!
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name of the class to look up.

## Return Value

The Class object for the named class, or `nil` if the class is not registered with the Objective-C runtime.

## Discussion

The implementation of this function is identical to the implementation of the [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/objc_lookUpClass(_:)] function.

## Obtaining Class Definitions

- **objc_getClassList(_:_:)**: Obtains the list of registered class definitions.
- **objc_copyClassList(_:)**: Creates and returns a list of pointers to all registered class definitions.
- **objc_lookUpClass(_:)**: Returns the class definition of a specified class.
- **objc_getRequiredClass(_:)**: Returns the class definition of a specified class.
- **objc_getMetaClass(_:)**: Returns the metaclass definition of a specified class.
